item.description:
Let's try a new restaurant in Milford that has been getting good reviews.

Bin 100 Restaurant's cuisine is upscale Spanish-Asian.Their wine list is composed of wines from around the globe. The dining area has a sophisticated, contemporary d√©cor with an upscale ambience. The restaurant also features a chic bar and lounge.




Paying:
- Bring cash, if you bring a credit card, you might end up having to pay the entire bill and having everyone give you their cash.
- Pay for what you eat and drink
- Pay tax and tip 26 % (20% tip + 6% tax)

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: March Dining Out Event
